installation\/cli.md.Vous pouvez directement installer l'OS e: You can directly install the OS and Jeedom at the same time while automating from the available ISO
installation\/cli.md.Vous avez juste ensuite à faire \"Instal: You then just have to do "Install on disk" (enter key), then "yes" (down arrow then enter
installation\/cli.md.Toute la suite va se faire automatiqueme: All the rest will be done automatically (10 to 30min), then once the vm restarted waiting 5min and you should have access to Jeedom by simply putting the ip of jeedom in a browser

installation\/freeboxdelta.md.il faut bien les garder en mémoire ils v: they must be kept in memory they will be asked for during an SSH connection
installation\/freeboxdelta.md.Vous pouvez vous connecter grâce à l'adr: You can connect using the address indicated on the page

installation\/freeboxdelta.md.cocher \"Écran\", ceci ne sert à rien su: check "Screen", this is useless on the Jeedom image (apart from overconsumption

installation\/index.md.Jeedom peut être installé sur différents: Jeedom can be installed on different hardware components
installation\/index.md.tout système Linux basé sur Debian 9 (st: any Linux system based on Debian 9 (stretch
installation\/index.md.Vous pouvez aussi acheter une box toute: You can also buy a ready-made box with Jeedom preinstalled which also contains a service pack (more support and services) and plugins offered
installation\/index.md.Voici une configuration \"type\" pour bi: Here is a "typical" configuration to get started with Jeedom in Z-Wave
installation\/index.md.Soit un total de 125 € pour une box domo: A total of € 125 for an open source home automation box with complete control over its installation
installation\/index.md.Il est possible d'ajouter ou de changer: It is possible to add or change by an Rfxcom antenna, or an enOcean key
installation\/index.md.et peuvent avoir besoin d'une connexion: and may need an internet connection
installation\/index.md.Jeedom est un logiciel qui est et rester: Jeedom is software that is and will remain open source, its use is completely free and does not depend on a cloud or a subscription
installation\/index.md.Cependant, certains plugins qui permette: However, some plugins that increase the capacity of Jeedom or its use may be chargeable
installation\/index.md.Vous pouvez retrouver la liste des plugi: You can find the list of plugins
installation\/index.md.Nous ne recommandons pas ce mode d'insta: We do not recommend this installation mode which makes the use of certain equipment complicated because of the Docker network mode
installation\/index.md.Une fois l'installation faites n'oubliez: Once installation do not forget to consult the documentation

installation\/mini.md.Le nom de l'image Jeedom peut être diffé: The name of the Jeedom image may be different from that of the captures made in this documentation

installation\/mini.md.Insérez votre carte SD dans votre ordina: Insert your SD card in your computer then launch the Etcher software, give it the path of the image, the path of the SD card and click on "Flash
installation\/mini.md.Le logiciel va graver la carte SD et vér: The software will burn the SD card and check the burning
installation\/mini.md.Vous n'avez plus qu'à mettre la carte SD: You just have to put the SD card in the Jeedomboard (or Hummingboard), connect the network and the power supply, your Jeedom will start (5 min) and you should see it on the network
installation\/mini.md.Pour la suite, vous pouvez suivre la doc: For the rest, you can follow the documentation

installation\/rpi.md.Vous trouverez ici la documentation pour: You will find here the documentation to install Jeedom on a raspberry PI
installation\/rpi.md.utilisation de l'image pour rapsberry pi: use of the image for rapsberry pi made by Jeedom with Jeeodm of preinstalled on it
installation\/rpi.md.installation manuel de jeedom à partir d: manual installation of jeedom from Raspberry pi OS
installation\/rpi.md.Debian 10 (Buster) est la distribution o: Debian 10 (Buster) is the officially supported distribution
installation\/rpi.md.Gravez cette image sur une SD avec Raspb: Burn this image on a SD with Raspberry Pi imager for example
installation\/rpi.md.Insérez votre carte SD, branchez le cabl: Insert your SD card, connect the network cable, connect the power
installation\/rpi.md.Lors du premiers démarrage le raspberry: During the first start-up the raspberry pi can be slow because it resizes the partition to correspond to your SD card. In addition, once the first start is made it is advisable to restart again so that the swap is of correct size
installation\/rpi.md.Si vous utilisez Etcher pour graver votr: If you use Etcher to burn your image, the decompression step is useless (Zip format recognized directly in the selection of the image file
installation\/rpi.md.Pour des raisons de sécurité, l'accès SS: For security reasons, SSH access is no longer enabled by default on this distribution
installation\/rpi.md.Il faut donc l'activer: So you have to activate it
installation\/rpi.md.Il faut créer sur la partition boot (la: An empty ssh file must be created on the boot partition (the only one accessible under windows)
installation\/rpi.md.nouveau \/ document texte et le renommer: new / text document and rename it to "ssh
installation\/rpi.md.Sous windows, dans l'explorateur il faut: Under windows, in the explorer you must therefore check your configuration in display / options / modify the folder and search options /
installation\/rpi.md.Identifiez votre Pi sur le réseau: Identify your Pi on the network
installation\/rpi.md.Il faut connaître l'adresse Ip de votre: You need to know the IP address of your PI. Many solutions
installation\/rpi.md.Consultez la configuration DHCP dans vot: Consult the DHCP configuration in your router
installation\/rpi.md.Utilisez un scanner de port type \"angyi: Use an angyipscanner type port scanner
installation\/rpi.md.Ensuite utilisez par exemple putty pour: Then use for example putty to establish your connection
installation\/rpi.md.Rentrer l'adresse de Ip de votre PI (ici: Enter the IP address of your PI (here 192.168.0
installation\/rpi.md.Accepter le message par défaut relatif à: Accept the default security message when logging in for the first time
installation\/rpi.md.Pour des raisons de sécurité, il est imp: For security reasons, it is imperative to change the default password
installation\/rpi.md.Les cas de piratages basés sur l'exploit: Cases of hacking based on the use of the default login / password pair of the Raspberry are particularly widespread
installation\/rpi.md.Le mot de passe sudo est également raspb: The sudo password is also raspberry
installation\/rpi.md.En fonction de votre débit internet, l'i: Depending on your internet speed, the installation can take 45 to 90 minutes
installation\/rpi.md.Vous ne devez surtout pas interrompre le: You must not interrupt the process before the end
installation\/rpi.md.A défaut, il faudra reprendre la totalit: Otherwise, you will have to repeat the entire procedure
installation\/rpi.md.Les identifiants par défaut sont admin\/: The default credentials are admin / admin
installation\/rpi.md.Les arguments suivants sont utilisables: The following arguments can be used
installation\/rpi.md.w = dossier webserver -z = installation: w = webserver folder -z = installation dependencies z-wave -m = desired mysql root password
installation\/rpi.md.Si vous utilisez votre Raspberry pour Je: If you use your Raspberry for Jeedom without a screen connected, it is recommended to carry the minimum RAM at the video part
installation\/rpi.md.Ensuite, vous pouvez suivre la documenta: Then you can follow the documentation

installation\/smart.md.Restauration en mode usine d'une Jeedom: Restoration to factory mode of a Jeedom Smart
installation\/smart.md.La Jeedom Smart est équipée d'un disque: The Jeedom Smart is equipped with an Emmc disc, guaranteeing better reliability than an SD card, but this disc is not directly accessible
installation\/smart.md.Le Recovery Mode USB englobe à la fois l: USB Recovery Mode includes both the system, the OS, and also the Jeedom application
installation\/smart.md.La reinitialisation de la Jeedom Smart e: Resetting the Jeedom Smart in "factory" OS + Jeedom configuration
Reinitializing the Jeedom Smart in "factory" configuration, then applying its Jeedom backup
installation\/smart.md.Pour rappel la gestion des sauvegardes\/: As a reminder, the management of backups / restores is available in Jeedom in the "notched wheels" menu at the top right, then "Backups
installation\/smart.md.Jeedom propose un service avec abonnemen: Jeedom offers a service with automatic backup subscription on private cloud Jeedom, so you don't have to worry about anything
installation\/smart.md.Sur le Market, dans votre compte, menu à: On the Market, in your account, menu on the left "Backup Cloud
installation\/smart.md.Pensez à mettre de côté (en local) une s: Remember to set aside (locally) a Jeedom configuration backup
installation\/smart.md.Attention de bien vérifier que le fichie: Be careful to verify that the file has the name backupJeedom.tar
installation\/smart.md.copiez cette archive sans la modifier ni: copy this archive without modifying or unzipping it, on a blank USB key formatted in FAT32
installation\/smart.md.arrêtez votre Smart proprement par Jeedo: shutdown your Smart properly by Jeedom
installation\/smart.md.cherchez votre Smart sur le réseau: find your Smart on the network
installation\/smart.md.Un Recovery Mode remet quoi qu'il arrive: Recovery Mode puts your Smart back in new "factory" configuration
installation\/smart.md.Si vous avez une sauvegarde de votre con: If you have a backup of your Jeedom configuration, you only need to restore it afterwards
installation\/smart.md.Ce Recovery Mode n'est compatible qu'ave: This Recovery Mode is only compatible with Jeedom Smart

installation\/synology.md.Vous trouverez ici la documentation pas: Here you will find the documentation step by step to install Jeedom on a Synology (DSM 5
installation\/synology.md.Cliquez sur tous, puis installez le paqu: Click all, then install the Docker package
installation\/synology.md.Attendez jusqu'à ce que l'installation s: Wait until the installation is finished
installation\/synology.md.Pour avoir accès au paquet Docker, il fa: To access the Docker package, you must have DSM 5
installation\/synology.md.Dans le champ de recherche, tapez \"jeed: In the search field, type "jeedom", select jeedom / jeedom (take the latest version) and click on download
installation\/synology.md.Validez ensuite la demande de version, l: Then validate the version request, the best being to take the last
installation\/synology.md.Cliquez ensuite sur image, ici vous pouv: Then click on image, here you can follow the progress of the download (can take several tens of minutes
installation\/synology.md.Une fois terminé, cliquez sur l'image pu: Once finished, click on the image then launch
installation\/synology.md.Donnez un nom à votre jeedom, cochez la: Give a name to your jeedom, check the box "Run the container using elevated privileges" then click on advanced parameters then in port parameters redirected port 80 (here around 9080
installation\/synology.md.Puis sur \"Volume\" ajoutez les 2 volume: Then on "Volume" add the following 2 volumes
installation\/synology.md.Cochez \"Exécuter le conteneur à l'aide: Check "Run the container using elevated privileges" then validate everything
installation\/synology.md.Certain plugin on besoin d'avoir le broa: Certain plugin you need to have network broadcast (Xioami plugin type), for this you must ABSOLUTELY switch to network in host mode (only possible during creation), change the default listening port of the web server ( type 9080 for the web server
installation\/synology.md.Après une phase de 1er démarrage plus ou: After a first or longer start-up phase you just have to go to IP_NAS
installation\/synology.md.Ensuite, vous pouvez suivre la documenta: Then you can follow the documentation

installation\/vm.md.Si vous voulez découvrir Jeedom sans ris: If you want to discover Jeedom without risk, you can also virtualize it on your PC, here is the procedure to follow
installation\/vm.md.Vous ne prenez aucun risque dans une VM,: You take no risk in a VM, the integrity of your PC is protected
installation\/vm.md.Vous devez télécharger le logicel Virtua: You must download the Virtual Box software
installation\/vm.md.Cliquez sur nouvelle et renseignez les c: Click on new and fill in the fields as below
installation\/vm.md.Cliquez sur suivant, adapter la taille d: Click on next, adapt the memory size in relation to your system (1024 are sufficient
installation\/vm.md.Cliquez sur suivant, créer un disque vir: Click next, create a virtual disk now
installation\/vm.md.Cliquez sur suivant, Choisissez une tail: Click on next, Choose a size for the space (4GB is enough
installation\/vm.md.Sélectionnez ensuite réseau et choisisse: Then select network and choose "bridge access" in network access mode
installation\/vm.md.Selectionnez \"Install on disk\" (touche: Select "Install on disk" (enter key on the keyboard), confirm with yes (down arrow key then enter
installation\/vm.md.Toute la suite va se faire automatiqueme: All the rest will be done automatically (10 to 30min), then once the vm restarted waiting 5min and you should have access to Jeedom by simply putting the ip of jeedom in a browser
installation\/vm.md.Pour connaitre l'ip de la vm (une fois c: To find out the IP of the VM (once connected to it, the identifiers are displayed on the connection screen)
installation\/vm.md.Téléchargement d'une image Debian strech: Downloading a Debian strecht image - netinstall
installation\/vm.md.Téléchargez une image minimaliste debian: Download a minimalist debian 10 Buster image
installation\/vm.md.Installez la debian de préférence sans i: Install the debian preferably without graphical interface because useless
installation\/vm.md.Dans la plupart des écrans, il suffit de: In most screens, you just have to validate the default choice
installation\/vm.md.Vous pouvez laissez des champs vides, ce: You can leave empty fields, it is not blocking
installation\/vm.md.Pour Grub, pas d'inquiétude, le secteur: For Grub, do not worry, the boot sector is that of the VM, not that of your PC. No risk of breaking anything
installation\/vm.md.Identifiez-vous avec l'utilisateur et le: Identify yourself with the user and password chosen during installation
installation\/vm.md.Saisissez le mot de passe root défini pe: Enter the root password set during installation
installation\/vm.md.Récupérez le script jeedom, le rendre ex: Get the jeedom script, make it executable, launch it
installation\/vm.md.Pour connaitre l'adresse Ip Lan de la VM: To know the Ip Lan address of the VM
installation\/vm.md.Il vous suffit de la saisir dans votre n: Just enter it in your browser
installation\/vm.md.Si cela ne fonctionne pas, vous n'avez p: If this does not work, you have not configured your network card as Network Bridge as indicated at the start
installation\/vm.md.Ensuite, vous pouvez suivre la documenta: Then you can follow the documentation
